tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE dance_classes (
    class_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    class_name TEXT,
    instructor_id INT,
    class_schedule TEXT,
    class_capacity INT
);

CREATE TABLE dance_classes (
    class_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    class_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    instructor_id INT NOT NULL,
    class_day VARCHAR(15) NOT NULL,
    class_time TIME NOT NULL
);
CREATE TABLE DanceClasses (class_id INT PRIMARY KEY, class_name VARCHAR(255), class_schedule VARCHAR(255))
CREATE TABLE Instructors (instructor_id INT PRIMARY KEY, instructor_name VARCHAR(255), specialty VARCHAR(255))
CREATE TABLE StudentEnrollments (enrollment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, student_id INT, class_id INT, enrollment_date DATE)

CREATE TABLE dance_classes (
 class_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 class_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
 class_time TIME,
 instructor_id INT,
 class_capacity INT
);

CREATE TABLE enrollments (
 enrollment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 student_id INT,
 class_id INT,
 enrollment_date DATE,
 FOREIGN KEY (student_id) REFERENCES students(student_id),
 FOREIGN KEY (class_id) REFERENCES dance_classes(class_id)
);

CREATE TABLE class_schedule (
 schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 class_id INT,
 instructor_id INT,
 schedule_date DATE,
 start_time TIME,
 end_time TIME,
 venue VARCHAR(255),
 FOREIGN KEY (class_id) REFERENCES dance_classes(class_id),
 FOREIGN KEY (instructor_id) REFERENCES instructors(instructor_id)
);
